title: Cambodia Five-Star Krabey Island Pool Villa Oceanfront Haven
description: Lose yourself in an elevated level of barefoot luxury at the five-star Six Senses Krabey Island, a decadent resort located on its own private island in the Gulf of Thailand. Accessible only by speedboat, this property was designed with privacy in mind. Spend serene days indulging at the onsite restaurants, enjoying relaxing spa treatments, unwinding with a sauna session or joining a yoga class. After long days in paradise, retreat to your private pool villa and admire the panoramic ocean vistas.
offer_address: Koh Krabey Island, Ream Commune, Preah Sihanouk Province 18000, Cambodia
